attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recomend that John Wick is put forward for a kight hood for his bravery in exposing the corruption and criminal activities of the polititions who are supposed to represent the British public

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
